video.browserNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback

partyModeInfo.description: Tournament mode for 4-16 players with brackets and statistics
partyModeInfo.welcome: Welcome to Party Mode for tournament-style multiplayer games!
partyModeInfo.helpDescription: New to Party Mode? Learn the basics with our interactive tutorial
partyModeInfo.createDescription: Create tournaments for 4-16 players and customize settings
partyModeInfo.joinDescription: Enter lobby code to join an existing tournament

features.tournaments: Tournament Formats: Single elimination, double elimination, round robin
features.customizable: Customizable: Round count, format and more
features.chat: Chat System: Communicate throughout the tournament

welcome.title: Welcome to Party Mode
welcome.content: Party Mode allows 4-16 players to compete in organized tournaments with different formats and comprehensive statistics tracking.
tips: Perfect for groups and competitive play

creating.title: Creating a Tournament
creating.content: As a host, you can create tournaments with customizable settings including player count, round count, and tournament format.
tips: Select Single/Double Elimination or Round Robin

joining.title: Joining a Tournament
joining.content: Join existing tournaments using a 6-character lobby code shared by the host. Codes are case-insensitive and use letters and numbers.
tips: Get the lobby code from the tournament host
Join quickly before the lobby fills up
You can leave and rejoin before the tournament starts

formats.title: Tournament Formats
formats.content: Choose from three tournament formats, each offering a different competitive experience.
tips: Single Elimination: One loss eliminates you
Double Elimination: Second chances with winners/losers brackets
Round Robin: Everyone plays everyone once
Format affects tournament duration and strategy

gameplay.title: Tournament Gameplay
gameplay.content: During tournaments, you'll play multiple matches against different opponents. Eliminated players can spectate ongoing matches.
tips: Matches are automatically paired by the system
Chat with other participants during breaks

statistics.title: Statistics & Rankings
statistics.content: Comprehensive statistics track your performance across all tournament matches with detailed analytics and leaderboards.

loyal.name: The Loyalist
loyal.description: Always tries to cooperate and build trust

adaptive.name: The Mirror
adaptive.description: Adapts to your behavior and mirrors your choices

fearful.name: The Paranoid
fearful.description: Always expects betrayal and acts defensively

manipulative.name: The Deceiver
manipulative.description: Pretends to cooperate but often betrays

messages.uncertain: I'm not sure what to do

multiplayer.rematchRequested: Your opponent wants to play again!

mainMenu.description: Enter the interrogation room. Face the ultimate test of trust and betrayal. Every decision matters. Every choice has consequences.
mainMenu.faceAIOpponents: Face AI opponents with different strategies
mainMenu.rule1: Two players face the classic Prisoner's Dilemma
mainMenu.rule3: Your fate depends on both your choice and your opponent's
mainMenu.rule4: Trust leads to mutual benefit, betrayal to individual gain
mainMenu.rule5: Build your reputation through multiple rounds
mainMenu.multiplayerAlert: Multiplayer coming soon! For now, enjoy single player with AI characters.

gameBoard.useCommunicationPanel: Use the communication panel to send messages
gameBoard.autoDecisionWarning: If time runs out, 'Stay Silent' will be chosen automatically

aiPanel.opponentDescription: This opponent keeps their strategy secret. Try to predict their behavior by observing their actions.

statisticsPanel.fearBasedDecisions: You tend to make fear-based decisions early under pressure.
statisticsPanel.cooperativeStrategy: You favor cooperative and trust-based strategies.
statisticsPanel.adaptiveStrategy: You have a flexible approach that adapts to situations.
statisticsPanel.unpredictableStrategy: You have an unpredictable and variable playing style.

aiPersonalities.loadingDialogue: Preparing for the interrogation... Every choice matters.

marcus.name: Marcus the Loyal
marcus.description: A steadfast ally who believes in honor and cooperation
marcus.personality: Trustworthy, honorable, and believes in mutual benefit

echo.name: Echo the Mirror
echo.description: A calculating observer who learns from your every move
echo.personality: Analytical, observant, and adaptive to circumstances

vera.name: Vera the Paranoid
vera.description: A nervous soul who sees betrayal around every corner
vera.personality: Anxious, suspicious, and always expects the worst

silvia.name: Silvia the Deceiver
silvia.description: A charming manipulator who uses trust as a weapon

chaos.name: Chaos the Wildcard
chaos.description: An unpredictable entity driven by pure randomness

rex.name: Rex the Vengeful
rex.description: An unforgiving warrior who never forgets a betrayal
rex.personality: Honorable but unforgiving, with a long memory

tenseDialogue.interrogationRoom: {{playerName}}, you're in an interrogation room. Your partner is in the next room.
tenseDialogue.authoritiesEvidence: The authorities have evidence against both of you. What will you do?
tenseDialogue.cooperationWarning: Remember: cooperation might save you both... or leave you vulnerable.
tenseDialogue.partnerDecision: Your partner's decision will determine your fate. Choose wisely.
tenseDialogue.trustLuxury: Trust is a luxury you may not be able to afford.
tenseDialogue.clockTicking: The clock is ticking. Every second counts in here.
tenseDialogue.silenceGolden: Your silence could be golden... or it could be your downfall.
tenseDialogue.waitingMessage: Waiting for your partner's message... The silence is deafening.
tenseDialogue.communicationTime: You have 60 seconds to communicate. Choose your words carefully.
tenseDialogue.lastChance: Last chance to change your mind. Sometimes second thoughts save lives.

atmospheric.footsteps: You can hear footsteps in the corridor outside.
atmospheric.chairCreaks: The metal chair creaks under your weight.
atmospheric.clockTicks: A clock ticks somewhere in the distance.
atmospheric.heavyAir: The air feels heavy with tension.
atmospheric.heartPounds: Your heart pounds in the silence.
atmospheric.wallsClosing: The walls seem to close in around you.
atmospheric.timeMoves: Time moves differently in this room.

decisionReversal.title: Decision Reversal Opportunity
decisionReversal.question: You have one chance to change a previous decision. Would you like to use it?
decisionReversal.accept: Yes, I want to change a decision
decisionReversal.decline: No, keep all decisions as they are
decisionReversal.selectNewDecision: What would you like to change it to?
decisionReversal.aiAccepted: Your opponent has accepted the change.
decisionReversal.aiRejected: Your opponent has rejected the change.

rematch.requestMessage: They want to play again, do you accept?

leaderboard.guestNotice: Create an account to appear on the leaderboard!

messages.systemActive: Tournament in progress - matches are being automatically paired...

help.title: Tournament Help
help.singleEliminationHelp: Single Elimination: Players are eliminated after one loss. Fast and decisive.
help.doubleEliminationHelp: Double Elimination: Players get a second chance in the losers bracket. More forgiving format.
help.roundRobinHelp: Round Robin: Every player plays against every other player. Most comprehensive format.
help.bracketHelp: Click on matches to view details. Green indicates wins, red indicates losses.
help.spectatorHelp: Eliminated players can watch ongoing matches and chat with other spectators.
help.cooperationRateHelp: Percentage of rounds where you chose to cooperate (stay silent).
help.betrayalRateHelp: Percentage of rounds where you chose to betray (confess).
help.trustScoreHelp: Overall measure of how trustworthy you appeared to other players.
help.tip1: Observe other players' strategies during early matches
help.tip2: Adapt your strategy based on tournament format
help.tip3: Communication is key - use the chat strategically
help.tip4: Remember that reputation matters in multi-round tournaments

friends.title: Friends
friends.guestMessage: Create an account to add friends and access social features.
friends.confirmRemove: Are you sure you want to remove this friend?
friends.noFriends: You don't have any friends yet
